name: Candy-Shop-Eclipse
description: Candy Shop Eclipse is a dark theme that combines the mystery and drama of an eclipse with the sweetness and glamour of a candy shop. The theme features a deep black background that contrasts with the bright and colorful hues. The theme is ideal for those who want a striking and elegant look for their VS Code editor, with a touch of whimsy and fun. Candy Shop Eclipse is a theme that will make your coding experience more enjoyable and impressive.
